EmailTemplate.name: NMD Outreach 3
EmailTemplate.subject: Thanks for reaching out to WeWork!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Lead.Salutation_Name__c},
Are you still in need of workspace?
We would love to have you stop by for a tour and learn more about WeWork. Not only do we provide members with beautiful workspaces and an amazing network of 50,000+ other professionals, but also access to over 250 discounted perks and benefits like healthcare, web hosting, gym memberships, travel and more.
Don't hesitate to email me back or give me a call at {!Lead.Location_Phone_Number__c}. I'd love to learn more about how we can help with your business and workspace needs!
Best,
{!User.Name} {!Lead.Location_Phone_Number__c} wework.com
